sen.j: 陰陽博士（おんみょうはかせ）は、律令制で陰陽寮に設置された教官の1つ。
sen.e: Onmyo hakase was a teaching position created at the Onmyoryo (Bureau of Divination) under the Ritsuryo system (a system of centralized government based on the ritsuryo code).
